metadata.Title: CVE-2022-20566 on Ubuntu 23.10 (mantic) - medium
metadata.Description:
In l2cap_chan_put of l2cap_core, there is a possible use after free due toimproper locking. This could lead to local escalation of privilege with noadditional execution privileges needed. User interaction is not needed forexploitation.Product: AndroidVersions: Android kernelAndroid ID:A-165329981References: Upstream kernel

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2022-20566` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

linux-image-6.2.0-20-generic - 5.19.0-21.21
linux-image-6.2.0-20-generic-lpae - 5.19.0-21.21
linux-image-unsigned-6.2.0-20-generic - 5.19.0-21.21
linux-image-unsigned-6.2.0-20-generic-64k - 5.19.0-21.21
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-6.2.0-1003-aws - 5.19.0-1009.9
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-6.2.0-1003-azure - 5.19.0-1008.8
No subscription required

No subscription required

No subscription required
